section.title: Apache Forrest - uk.ac.osswatch.forrest.input.ohloh Plugin
section.p: Accesses the OhLoh.net APi to extract useful information about a project from their database.
section.warning: This plugin has very little functionality at this time since the OhLoh API itself is extremely limited. In fact, the plugin doesn't even provide valid XDocs for further processing by Forrest. it is really only useful in conjunction with uk.ac.osswatch.forrest.output.doap which can generate DOAP files from OhLoh data. These DOAP files can, in turn, be used by the Forrest DOAP plugin to create sensible content.

section.title: Samples
section.p: This section includes links to a number of samples using this plugin. The plugin is intended to be self documenting through these samples. If you require further help please ask on the user mailing list.
